summary:
Queens is a diverse borough of New York City, located on Long Island. It's the biggest borough by area and the second most populous. With many different languages and cultures, it's one of the most diverse places globally. Queens was established in 1683 and named after an English queen. It became a borough in 1898.

Home to two major airports and famous landmarks, Queens has a strong economy. Its neighborhoods include Flushing, Jamaica, and Long Island City, each with unique characteristics. The borough is also known for its sports venues and movie studios.
title: Queens
